topic.title: Topic & Purpose
topic.desc: Define your research area and objectives
topic.topicLabel: What is your general area of interest or research topic? *
topic.topicPlaceholder: Example: Social media impact on mental health in young adults
topic.topicHint: Be as specific or broad as you like - we'll help refine it
topic.purposeLabel: What is the purpose of this research? (Select all that apply)
topic.projectTypeLabel: What type of project is this? *

fiveWs.title: The 5 W's
fiveWs.desc: Define Who, What, Where, When, and Why

who.label: Who
who.focusLabel: Who or what is the focus of your research? *
who.subgroupsPlaceholder: Example: Male vs female, urban vs rural

what.label: What
what.variablesLabel: What variables, behaviors, or phenomena will you study? *
what.variablesPlaceholder: Example: Social media usage time, anxiety levels, depression symptoms
what.outcomePlaceholder: Example: Increased social media use leads to higher anxiety

where.label: Where
where.locationLabel: Where will this research take place? *
where.locationPlaceholder: Example: United States, Online platforms, Rural Southeast Asia

when.label: When
when.timeLabel: What time period will your research cover? *

why.label: Why
why.importancePlaceholder: Example: Mental health issues are rising among young adults...
why.beneficiariesLabel: Who will benefit from this research? (Optional)

resources.title: Resources & Constraints
resources.desc: Define your timeline, resources, and limitations
resources.durationLabel: How long do you have to complete this research?
resources.resourcesLabel: What resources do you have access to? (Check all that apply)
resources.experienceLabel: What is your research experience level?
resources.constraintsLabel: Are there areas or topics you want to avoid? (Optional)
resources.constraintsPlaceholder: Example: Sensitive personal data, High-cost experiments...
